trans-unit.source: 4095 external identifiers in one translation unit
trans-unit.target: 一个翻译单位有4095个外部标识符

trans-unit.source: 4095 macro identifiers simultaneously defined in one preprocessing translation unit
trans-unit.target: 在一个预处理翻译单元中同时定义4095个宏标识符。

trans-unit.source: 5) Expands to integer constant expression whose value is either INT_MIN or -INT_MAX.
trans-unit.target: 5）扩展为整数常量表达式，其值是 INT_MIN 或 -INT_MAX 。

trans-unit.source: 5) Function is executed, and the value it returns becomes the value of the function call expression (if the function returns void, the function call expression is a void expression)
trans-unit.target: 5)函数执行完毕,其返回的值成为函数调用表达式的值(如果函数返回void,则函数调用表达式为void表达式)。

trans-unit.source: 5) Identifiers declared as reserved for future use by the standard library, namely
trans-unit.target: 5)宣布为标准库保留给未来使用的标识符,即

trans-unit.source: 5) There is a sequence point at the end of a full declarator. 6) There is a sequence point immediately before the return of a library function. 7) There is a sequence point after the action associated with each conversion specifier in formatted I/O (in particular, it is well-formed for scanf to write different fields into the same variable and for printf to read and modify or modify the same variable more than once using %n) 8) There are sequence points before and immediately after each call to a comparison function made by the library functions qsort and bsearch, as well as between any call to the comparison function and the movement of the associated objects made by qsort
trans-unit.target: 5）在完整声明符的末尾有一个序列点。 6）在库函数返回之前有一个序列点。 7）在格式I / O中与每个转换说明符相关联的动作后都有一个序列点（特别是， scanf 可以将不同的字段写入同一变量，而 printf 可以读取和修改或修改相同的字段，格式良好使用 %n 多次修改变量）8）在每次调用由库函数 qsort 和 bsearch 进行的比较函数之前和之后都有序列点，以及在对比较函数的任何调用与关联对象的移动之间由 qsort 制造

trans-unit.source: 5) if both are pointers, the result is the pointer to the type that combines cvr-qualifiers of both pointed-to types (that is, if one is const int* and the other is volatile int*, the result is const volatile int*), and if the types were different, the pointed-to type is the composite type.
trans-unit.target: 5）如果两个都是指针，则结果是指向结合了两种指向类型的cvr限定符的类型的指针（即，如果一个是 const int* ，而另一个是 volatile int* ，则结果是 const volatile int* ），如果类型不同，则指向的类型是复合类型。

trans-unit.source: 5) multicharacter constant, e.g. 'AB', has type int and implementation-defined value.
trans-unit.target: 5）多字符常量，例如 'AB' ，具有 int 类型和实现定义的值。

trans-unit.source: 5) the rank of _Bool is less than the rank of any other standard integer type
trans-unit.target: 5)_Bool的等级小于任何其他标准整数类型的等级。

trans-unit.source: 5) wide string literal: The type of the literal is wchar_t[N], where N is the size of the string in code units of the execution wide encoding, including the null terminator. Each wchar_t element in the array is initialized as if by executing mbstowcs in implementation-defined locale.
trans-unit.target: 5）宽字符串文字：文字的类型是 wchar_t[N] ，其中 N 是执行宽度编码的代码单元（包括空终止符）中字符串的大小。就像在实现定义的语言环境中执行 mbstowcs 一样，初始化数组中的每个 wchar_t 元素。

trans-unit.source: 5)function declarator: the declaration S D(params) declared D as a function taking the parameters params and returning S. noptr-declarator is any other declarator except unparenthesized pointer declarator.
trans-unit.target: 5）函数声明器：声明 S D(params) 声明 D 为一个接受参数 params 并返回 S 的函数。noptr-declarator是除无括号指针声明符之外的任何其他声明符。

trans-unit.source: 5,6) number of characters transmitted to the output stream or negative value if an output error, a runtime constrants violation error, or an encoding error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 5,6)传输到输出流的字符数,如果发生输出错误、运行时常量违反错误或编码错误,则为负值。

trans-unit.source: 5,6) number of wide characters transmitted to the output stream or negative value if an output error, a runtime constraints violation error, or an encoding error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 5,6)传输到输出流的宽字符数,如果发生输出错误、运行时约束违反错误或编码错误,则为负值。

trans-unit.source: 5-7, 9-11) Computes the nearest integer value to arg (in integer format), rounding halfway cases away from zero, regardless of the current rounding mode.
trans-unit.target: 5-7，9-11）将最接近的整数值计算为 arg （以整数格式），将中值舍入到远离零的中间情况，而不管当前的舍入模式如何。

trans-unit.source: 5-7, 9-11) Rounds the floating-point argument arg to an integer value in integer format, using the current rounding mode.
trans-unit.target: 5-7，9-11）使用当前舍入模式将浮点参数 arg 舍入为整数格式的整数值。

trans-unit.source: 5-8) Same as (1-4), except that the following errors are detected at runtime and call the currently installed constraint handler function:
trans-unit.target: 5-8）与（1-4）相同，除了在运行时检测到以下错误并调用当前安装的约束处理程序函数外：
5.1.2.4 多线程执行和数据竞赛 (p:17-21)

trans-unit.source: 511 external identifiers in one translation unit
trans-unit.target: 511个外部标识符在一个翻译单元中

trans-unit.target: 511个标识符在一个区块中声明了区块范围

trans-unit.source: 6 significant initial characters in an external identifier
trans-unit.target: 外部标识符中6个重要的初始字符

trans-unit.source: 6) Expands to integer constant expression whose value is either INT_MIN or +INT_MAX.
trans-unit.target: 6）扩展为整数常量表达式，其值为 INT_MIN 或 +INT_MAX 。

trans-unit.source: 6) Number of wide characters (not counting the terminating null) that were written to buffer. Returns a negative value on encoding errors and on overflow. Returns zero on all other errors.
trans-unit.target: 6）写入 buffer 的宽字符数（不计终止空值）。在编码错误和溢出时返回负值。对所有其他错误返回零。

trans-unit.source: 6) if one is a pointer to void, the result is a pointer to void with combined cvr-qualifiers
trans-unit.target: 6)如果一个是指向void的指针,结果是一个指向void的指针,并结合了cvr-限定词

trans-unit.source: 6) the rank of any enumerated type equals the rank of its compatible integer type
trans-unit.target: 6)任何枚举类型的秩等于其兼容整数类型的秩。
6.2.3 标识符的名称空格(第31页)
6.2.3 标识符的名称空格(第37页)
6.5.2.4 后缀递增和递减运算符(p:75)
6.5.2.4 后缀递增和递减运算符(p:85)
6.5.3.1 前缀递增和递减运算符(p:78)
6.5.3.1 前缀递增和递减运算符(p:88)

6.5.3.2 地址和间接操作符(第88-89页)

trans-unit.source: 63 significant initial characters in an internal identifier or a macro name
trans-unit.target: 内部标识符或宏名中63个重要的首字母。

trans-unit.source: 7) Number of wide characters (not counting the terminating null) that would have been written to buffer had bufsz been sufficiently large, or a negative value if an error occurs. (meaning, write was successful and complete only if the return is nonnegative and less than bufsz)
trans-unit.target: 7）如果 bufsz 足够大，则应写入 buffer 的宽字符数（不计终止空值），如果发生错误，则为负数。 （意味着，仅当返回为非负且小于 bufsz 时，写入操作才能成功完成）

trans-unit.source: 7) Same as (6), except it will truncate the result to fit within the array pointed to by buffer. As with all bounds-checked functions, vwprintf_s , vfwprintf_s, vswprintf_s, and vsnwprintf_s are only guaranteed to be available if __STDC_LIB_EXT1__ is defined by the implementation and if the user defines __STDC_WANT_LIB_EXT1__ to the integer constant 1 before including stdio.h.
trans-unit.target: 7）与（6）相同，不同之处在于它将截断结果以适合 buffer 指向的数组。如同所有的边界检查功能， vwprintf_s ， vfwprintf_s ， vswprintf_s ，和 vsnwprintf_s 如果仅保证可供 __STDC_LIB_EXT1__ 被实现，并且如果所述用户定义定义 __STDC_WANT_LIB_EXT1__ 为整数常数1包括前 stdio.h 中。

trans-unit.source: 7) Same as (6), except it will truncate the result to fit within the array pointed to by s. As with all bounds-checked functions, wprintf_s , fwprintf_s, swprintf_s, and snwprintf_s are only guaranteed to be available if __STDC_LIB_EXT1__ is defined by the implementation and if the user defines __STDC_WANT_LIB_EXT1__ to the integer constant 1 before including stdio.h.
trans-unit.target: 7）与（6）相同，不同之处在于它将截断结果以适合s指向的数组。如同所有的边界检查功能， wprintf_s ， fwprintf_s ， swprintf_s ，和 snwprintf_s 如果仅保证可供 __STDC_LIB_EXT1__ 被实现，并且如果所述用户定义定义 __STDC_WANT_LIB_EXT1__ 包括之前为整数常数1 stdio.h 中。

trans-unit.source: 7) Type-generic macro: If any argument has type long double, fmal is called. Otherwise, if any argument has integer type or has type double, fma is called. Otherwise, fmaf is called.
trans-unit.target: 7）类型通用宏：如果任何参数的类型为 long double ，则调用 fmal 。否则，如果任何参数有整数类型或具有类型 double ， fma 被调用。否则，将调用 fmaf 。

trans-unit.source: 7) Type-generic macro: If any argument has type long double, nextafterl is called. Otherwise, if any argument has integer type or has type double, nextafter is called. Otherwise, nextafterf is called.
trans-unit.target: 7）类型通用宏：如果任何参数的类型为 long double ，则调用 nextafterl 。否则，如果任何参数为整数类型或为 double 类型，则调用 nextafter 。否则，将调用 nextafterf 。

trans-unit.source: 7) number of characters written to buffer, not counting the null character (which is always written as long as buffer is not a null pointer and bufsz is not zero and not greater than RSIZE_MAX), or zero on runtime constraint violations, and negative value on encoding errors
trans-unit.target: 7）写入 buffer 的字符数，不计算空字符（只要 buffer 不是空指针并且 bufsz 不为零且不大于 RSIZE_MAX ，就始终写入空字符），或者在违反运行时约束时为零，并且为负值关于编码错误

trans-unit.source: 7) number of wide characters written to buffer, not counting the null wide character (which is always written as long as buffer is not a null pointer and bufsz is not zero and not greater than RSIZE_MAX/sizeof(wchar_t)), or zero on runtime constraint violations, and negative value on encoding errors
trans-unit.target: 7）写入 buffer 的宽字符数，不计算空的宽字符（只要 buffer 不是空指针并且 bufsz 不为零且不大于 RSIZE_MAX/sizeof(wchar_t) ，就始终写入），或者为零运行时约束违例，编码错误为负值

trans-unit.source: 7) ranking is transitive: if rank of T1 < rank of T2 and rank of T2 < rank of T3 then rank of T1 < rank of T3
trans-unit.target: 7）等级是可传递的：如果T1等级<T2等级和T2等级<T3等级，则T1等级<T3等级
